citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00 PM on 12-
JULY-2023. The inspector knocked on the door and spoke to a family member who stated the licensee was not home and
would not be available for inspection. The inspector was also told that no one else was available for inspection. Licensee
was also called and a voicemail was left.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00 PM on 12-
JULY-2023. The inspector knocked on the door and spoke to a family member who stated the licensee was not home and 
would not be available for inspection. The inspector was also told that no one else was available for inspection. Licensee 
was also called and a voicemail was left. 
 
 
End Section
